allow:
Bash(# Rename token images based on their game level
mv assets/new_generated/game_ready/cropped_optimized_xrpl_coin.png assets/tokens/token_01_xrp.png
mv assets/new_generated/game_ready/cropped_optimized_rocket_vertical.png assets/tokens/token_03_rocket.png
mv assets/new_generated/game_ready/cropped_optimized_diamond.png assets/tokens/token_04_diamond.png
mv assets/new_generated/game_ready/cropped_optimized_hold_shield.png assets/tokens/token_05_shield.png
mv assets/new_generated/game_ready/cropped_optimized_wheal.png assets/tokens/token_06_whale.png
mv assets/new_generated/game_ready/cropped_optimized_Spiral_galaxy_formation.png assets/tokens/token_09_galaxy.png
mv assets/new_generated/game_ready/cropped_optimized_hodl.png assets/tokens/token_10_hodl.png
mv assets/new_generated/game_ready/cropped_optimized_crown.png assets/tokens/token_11_crown.png

# Move effects
mv assets/img/pop.png assets/effects/pop_effect.png
mv assets/new_generated/super_opt_optimized_particle_blast.png assets/effects/particle_blast.png

# Move UI elements
mv assets/new_generated/optimized_start_button.png assets/ui/start_button.png
mv assets/new_generated/optimized_Seamless_cosmic_nebula_texture.jpeg assets/ui/background_nebula.jpg)

Bash(# Clean up empty directories
find assets -type d -empty -delete)
